mutants.code:
def find_shortest_path(input_str: str) -> int:
    (i, j) = (0, 0)
    total_moves = 0
    for char in input_str:
        elen = ord(char) - ord('a')
        icur = elen // 5
        jcur = elen % 5
        total_moves += abs(i - icur) + abs(j - jcur)
        (i, j) = (icur, jcur)
    total_moves -= len(input_str)
    return total_moves
